Articles.Content:
So I've stumbled across this part mod Which was made pre-.17 and I was wondering how to update it to .23. I've tried adding the appropriate bits but I can't seem to get it to work.

Another issue I'm running across is one of legality. If I can get it working I would like to release it for the community to use (I like it as an escape pod) but since there is no license I am unsure if this is possible.
Anything with engines wouldn't work without being able to add the now required thrustTransform's to the model/.mu files, not sure if that applies to RCS thrusters (transforms) also

If they're .DAEs, you can shove them into unity to add the required transforms. DAEs themselves aren't supported well by the game any more. You'll also have to add in partmodules, but it seems you can already do that.

Since it has no license, you can't release it. You can try getting in touch with the original developer of that mod, though.

I sent him a PM, (Last online 15th Feb 2014) so I'm waiting for a response, and the specific issues I'm having is, While everything works for the legacy parts (By putting them in the parts folder, not in GameData) I was hoping I could update the syntax and it would work, but if it involves tossing things in Unity That might be a little out of my knowledge base.
